tasks: Managing and upgrading an infrastructure running on MERN (Mongo, Express, React, Node)
data.description: At Limpide, a startup focused on helping French companies secure the best energy prices, I had the opportunity to manage and upgrade an infrastructure running on the MERN stack (Mongo, Express, React, Node). Additionally, I worked on developing new features. My responsibilities included working with virtual machines, cloud services, and developing a React.js front-end with a REST API implemented in Express and MongoDB.

tasks: Importation and processing of data from .csv files
data.description: During my internship at Thales LAS France SAS, I was responsible for building automated Excel files using VBA and handling the importation and processing of data from .csv files. Additionally, I worked on constructing an Estimate At Completion (EAC) and gained experience in C++. It was a remarkable opportunity to work with a team of eight members and discover the inner workings of sizable companies.

data.company: Forest Management in Company Cresci Alexandre
tasks: Building a management software for lumberjacks
Front-end with C# and back-end with C/C++
data.description: During my internship at Forest Management in Company Cresci Alexandre, I developed a wood cubing management software. The front-end was created using C#, while the back-end involved C/C++. Furthermore, I designed a database using SQL. Despite the challenges posed by the COVID-19 period, I successfully managed to create a software solution that is still being utilized by lumberjacks today. This experience taught me how to work remotely and provided me with valuable insights.

During two separate occasions in July 2020 and July 2021, I worked as an employee at Festieat, a bar located in Port Barcarès. My roles included managing clients, handling cashier duties, serving as a barman, and working as a porter. Although the work was demanding and exhausting, this experience taught me the value of hard work and its rewarding outcomes.
